Title: The Chase
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Romance, Thriller
Actors: Charlie Sheen, Kristy Swanson, Henry Rollins, Josh Mostel
Plot: Jack Hammond is sentenced to life in prison, but manages to escape. To get away from the police he takes a girl as hostage and drives off in her car. The girl happens to be the only daughter of one of the richest men in the state. In a while the car chase is being broadcast live on every TV-channel, covering the event from helicopters, the backseat of a police car, the pavement of the highway etc.
